Name: Bloomin' Onion (PH)
Description: An onion prepared and fried to look like a flower.

DescriptionLocalization.es: An onion prepared and fried to look like a flower.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: An onion prepared and fried to look like a flower.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Eine Zwiebel, die so zubereitet und gebraten wird, dass sie wie eine Blume aussieht.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: An onion prepared and fried to look like a flower.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: An onion prepared and fried to look like a flower.
DescriptionLocalization.it: An onion prepared and fried to look like a flower.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: An onion prepared and fried to look like a flower.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: An onion prepared and fried to look like a flower.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Лук, приготовленный и обжаренный. Форма напоминает цветок.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: An onion prepared and fried to look like a flower.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 油炸洋葱。形状像一朵花。
